theSlumbering:BasicAttack.NAME: Basic Attack
theSlumbering:BasicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You are feeling [#666646]groggy...[]

theSlumbering:BasicDefend.NAME: Basic Defend
theSlumbering:BasicDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.
theSlumbering:BasicDefend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 theslumbering:Drowsy. NL You hear [#666646]screams...[] in your mind.

theSlumbering:DrowsyAttack.NAME: Drowsy Attack
theSlumbering:DrowsyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 theslumbering:Drowsy. NL You can feel [#666646]energy[] returning to your body.

theSlumbering:DrowsyDefend.NAME: Drowsy Defend
theSlumbering:DrowsyDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 theslumbering:Drowsy. NL [#666646]Whispers[] echo through your mind.

theSlumbering:WokeAttack.NAME: Awakened Attack
theSlumbering:WokeAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 theslumbering:Drowsy.

theSlumbering:WokeDefend.NAME: Awakened Defend
theSlumbering:WokeDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increased by !M! each time you theslumbering:Snooze a card. NL Lose 1 theslumbering:Drowsy.

theSlumbering:NocturnalMyoclonus.NAME: Nocturnal Strike
theSlumbering:NocturnalMyoclonus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If theslumbering:Drowsy, gain that much Block.
theSlumbering:NocturnalMyoclonus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If theslumbering:Drowsy, gain that much Block. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.

theSlumbering:WakeUpSlap.NAME: Wake-Up Slap
theSlumbering:WakeUpSlap.DESCRIPTION: Take !theSlumbering:Magic! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn.

theSlumbering:ThornCloak.NAME: Cloak of Thorns
theSlumbering:ThornCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

theSlumbering:Parry.NAME: Parry
theSlumbering:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 theslumbering:Parry. NL Gain !B! Block. NL theslumbering:Renewable.

theSlumbering:Invigorate.NAME: Invigorate
theSlumbering:Invigorate.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Reduce theslumbering:Drowsy by !M!. NL theslumbering:Snooze.
theSlumbering:Invigorate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Reduce theslumbering:Drowsy by !M!. NL theslumbering:Snooze.

theSlumbering:ExtraArm.NAME: Extra Arm
theSlumbering:ExtraArm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a bonus attack.

theSlumbering:Reflect.NAME: Reflect
theSlumbering:Reflect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, reflect 30% of the damage.

theSlumbering:TheSeed.NAME: The Seed
theSlumbering:TheSeed.DESCRIPTION: Add a theslumbering:Seed to your deck. NL (Removed from your deck after playing)

theSlumbering:Seed.NAME: Seed
theSlumbering:Seed.DESCRIPTION: Blossoms after being played 5 times. NL (Currently has been played !M! times)

theSlumbering:ExplosivesCache.NAME: Explosives Cache
theSlumbering:ExplosivesCache.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, but shuffle a theslumbering:Bomb into your draw pile.

theSlumbering:Bomb.NAME: Bomb
theSlumbering:Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take 10 damage. NL Ethereal.

theSlumbering:Detonator.NAME: Detonator
theSlumbering:Detonator.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, deal !D! damage to all enemies.

theSlumbering:BombToss.NAME: Bomb Toss
theSlumbering:BombToss.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a theslumbering:Detonator into your draw pile X times.

theSlumbering:Wake.NAME: Wake
theSlumbering:Wake.DESCRIPTION: Add theslumbering:Yawn and theslumbering:Stretch to your discard pile. Play both to wake up a little. NL Exhaust.
theSlumbering:Wake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add theslumbering:Yawn+ and theslumbering:Stretch+ to your discard pile. Play both to wake up a little. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:Yawn.NAME: Yawn
theSlumbering:Yawn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL More powerful if played with theslumbering:Stretch. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:Stretch.NAME: Stretch
theSlumbering:Stretch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL More powerful if played with theslumbering:Yawn. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:Nightmare.NAME: Eerie Nightmare
theSlumbering:Nightmare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each theslumbering:Drowsy. NL Reduce theslumbering:Drowsy by !theSlumbering:Magic!.

theSlumbering:Insomnia.NAME: Insomnia
theSlumbering:Insomnia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each theslumbering:Drowsy. NL Reduce theslumbering:Drowsy by !theSlumbering:Magic!.

theSlumbering:SleepParalysis.NAME: Sleep Paralysis
theSlumbering:SleepParalysis.DESCRIPTION: Negate the first !M! attack this turn. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:Lullaby.NAME: Lullaby
theSlumbering:Lullaby.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Apply !theSlumbering:Magic! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
theSlumbering:Lullaby.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Apply !theSlumbering:Magic! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
theSlumbering:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ALL enemies gain !M! Strength.

theSlumbering:ImagineSkill.NAME: Imagine: Skill
theSlumbering:ImagineSkill.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If you draw a Skill, Refund this card's cost.
theSlumbering:ImagineSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw two cards. For each Skill, Refund this card's cost.

theSlumbering:ImagineAttack.NAME: Imagine: Attack
theSlumbering:ImagineAttack.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If you draw a Attack, Refund this card's cost.
theSlumbering:ImagineAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw two cards. For each Attack, Refund this card's cost.

theSlumbering:ImaginePower.NAME: Imagine: Power
theSlumbering:ImaginePower.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If you draw a Power, Refund this card's cost.
theSlumbering:ImaginePower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw two cards. For each Power, Refund this card's cost.

theSlumbering:RecurringDream.NAME: Recurring Dream
theSlumbering:RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Select a card in your hand. NL Draw all copies of it in your draw pile.
theSlumbering:RecurringDream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select a card in your hand. NL Draw all copies of it in your draw pile and discard pile.

theSlumbering:EnergyShift.NAME: Energy Shift
theSlumbering:EnergyShift.DESCRIPTION: Select a card. NL This turn, it costs !M! less.

theSlumbering:Offering.NAME: Offering
theSlumbering:Offering.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Play a new card based on the discarded card type.
theSlumbering:Offering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Play a new upgraded card based on the discarded card type.

theSlumbering:Sleepwalk.NAME: Sleepwalk
theSlumbering:Sleepwalk.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Deal !D! to a random enemy when drawn.

theSlumbering:Comfortable.NAME: Comfortable
theSlumbering:Comfortable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain [E] and 1 Artifact when drawn.

theSlumbering:SideSleeper.NAME: Side Sleeper
theSlumbering:SideSleeper.DESCRIPTION: The leftmost card in your hand ALWAYS costs !M!.

theSlumbering:BagOfShields.NAME: Bag of Shields
theSlumbering:BagOfShields.DESCRIPTION: theslumbering:Passive. NL Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

theSlumbering:SpectralDefender.NAME: Spectral Defender
theSlumbering:SpectralDefender.DESCRIPTION: theslumbering:Passive. NL At the end of your turn, double your Block.

theSlumbering:ToughSkin.NAME: Tough Skin
theSlumbering:ToughSkin.DESCRIPTION: theslumbering:Passive. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block.

theSlumbering:StrongFooting.NAME: Strong Footing
theSlumbering:StrongFooting.DESCRIPTION: If you have !M! or less Block, double your Block.

theSlumbering:StoneHearth.NAME: Stone Hearth
theSlumbering:StoneHearth.DESCRIPTION: Deal between !D! and !M! damage to a random enemy and gain that much Block.

theSlumbering:InducedDream.NAME: Induced Dream
theSlumbering:InducedDream.DESCRIPTION: Look at 3 cards in your draw pile, choose 1 and add a copy of it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:InducedMemory.NAME: Induced Memory
theSlumbering:InducedMemory.DESCRIPTION: Look at 3 cards in your draw pile, choose 1 to draw.

theSlumbering:LingeringDoubt.NAME: Lingering Doubt
theSlumbering:LingeringDoubt.DESCRIPTION: If this card hasn't been played by the end of battle, lose !theSlumbering:Magic! Max HP. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:Sloth.NAME: Sloth
theSlumbering:Sloth.DESCRIPTION: Start battles with !theSlumbering:Magic! additional theslumbering:Drowsy. NL Lose !theSlumbering:Magic! theslumbering:Drowsy when played.

theSlumbering:Insomniac.NAME: Insomniac
theSlumbering:Insomniac.DESCRIPTION: theslumbering:Passive. NL At the start of battle, shuffle a theslumbering:Sleepwalk into your draw pile !M! times.

theSlumbering:EntombedWeapon.NAME: Entombed Blade
theSlumbering:EntombedWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cannot be upgraded normally. NL Play !M! more times to upgrade this card.

theSlumbering:RunTheGamut.NAME: Run The Gamut
theSlumbering:RunTheGamut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cannot be played if you've played fewer than !theSlumbering:Magic! cards this turn.
theSlumbering:RunTheGamut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Cannot be played if you've played fewer than !theSlumbering:Magic! cards this turn.

theSlumbering:RecklessBlow.NAME: Reckless Blow
theSlumbering:RecklessBlow.DESCRIPTION: Additionally costs 8 Block. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need more #yBlock to use this.

theSlumbering:ShieldToss.NAME: Shield Toss
theSlumbering:ShieldToss.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your Block. NL For every 10 Block, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theSlumbering:FalseNap.NAME: False Nap
theSlumbering:FalseNap.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be played if other cards have been played. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have already played a card this turn.

theSlumbering:CountingSheep.NAME: Counting Sheep
theSlumbering:CountingSheep.DESCRIPTION: theslumbering:Search - Attack NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each card searched.

theSlumbering:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
theSlumbering:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand and discard pile into your draw pile, then redraw your hand. NL Exhaust.
theSlumbering:Mulligan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand and discard pile into your draw pile, then redraw your hand.

theSlumbering:Hypersomnia.NAME: Hypersomnia
theSlumbering:Hypersomnia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theslumbering:Drowsy. NL Gain !theSlumbering:Magic! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !theSlumbering:Magic! Strength.

theSlumbering:FullGuard.NAME: Full Guard
theSlumbering:FullGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn.

theSlumbering:NightTerror.NAME: Night Terror
theSlumbering:NightTerror.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy, and [#ebc634]Stun it for one turn.

theSlumbering:Hallucinations.NAME: Hallucinations
theSlumbering:Hallucinations.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently gain !theSlumbering:Magic! damage the first time played each combat. NL theslumbering:Snooze.

theSlumbering:SelectiveMemory.NAME: Selective Memory
theSlumbering:SelectiveMemory.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Remove that card and this card from your deck.

theSlumbering:FocusedStrike.NAME: Focused Strike
theSlumbering:FocusedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are not theslumbering:Drowsy, deal !D! damage !M! more times.

theSlumbering:ForcedThought.NAME: Forced Thought
theSlumbering:ForcedThought.DESCRIPTION: theslumbering:Search - Any NL (Choose to search for an attack, a skill, or a power card)

theSlumbering:TrialsofHypnos.NAME: Trials of Hypnos
theSlumbering:TrialsofHypnos.DESCRIPTION: Wager 10% of your gold to attempt a theslumbering:Trial_of_Hypnos. NL Exhaust.
theSlumbering:TrialsofHypnos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Wager 10% of your gold to attempt a theslumbering:Trial_of_Hypnos. NL Exhaust. NL (Upgrading unlocks harder, but more rewarding trials)

theSlumbering:Scavenge.NAME: Scavenge
theSlumbering:Scavenge.DESCRIPTION: If you have more than !M! attacks in your discard, deal !D! damage.
theSlumbering:Scavenge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have more than !M! attacks in your discard, deal !D! damage. NL If you have more than !M! skills, gain !B! Block.

theSlumbering:GuardedSwipe.NAME: Guarded Swipe
theSlumbering:GuardedSwipe.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.
theSlumbering:GuardedSwipe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When drawn, gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL theslumbering:Snooze.

theSlumbering:RestedPunch.NAME: Rested Punch
theSlumbering:RestedPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When drawn, this card gains !M! damage for one use. NL theslumbering:Snooze.

theSlumbering:InescapableThoughts.NAME: Unrelenting
theSlumbering:InescapableThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Repeat the next card costing at least 1 that you play until it can no longer be played.

theSlumbering:NocturnalGifts.NAME: Nocturnal Gifts
theSlumbering:NocturnalGifts.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each theslumbering:Drowsy you have.

theSlumbering:SoundBarrier.NAME: Sound Barrier
theSlumbering:SoundBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each theslumbering:Snooze card in your deck.

theSlumbering:SafeBarrage.NAME: Safe Barrage
theSlumbering:SafeBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your Block is greater than !theSlumbering:Magic!. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theSlumbering:PanicAttack.NAME: Panic Attack
theSlumbering:PanicAttack.DESCRIPTION: [#ebc634]Stun all enemies for one turn, but add a random Curse to your deck.

theSlumbering:DreamPeace.NAME: Dream: Peace
theSlumbering:DreamPeace.DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! percent of its max health and gain that much Block. (Gain double Block if enemy is not a Boss or Elite) NL theslumbering:Snooze.

theSlumbering:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
theSlumbering:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no other cards can be played. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theSlumbering:BindingBlow.NAME: Binding Blow
theSlumbering:BindingBlow.DESCRIPTION: You cannot play other cards this turn until this card has been played. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am bound by more than one source.

theSlumbering:DreamDeath.NAME: Dream: Death
theSlumbering:DreamDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. If it dies, return this card to you hand. NL theslumbering:Snooze.
theSlumbering:DreamDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. If it dies, return this card to you hand and Refund. NL theslumbering:Snooze.

theSlumbering:MentalBlock.NAME: Mental Block
theSlumbering:MentalBlock.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Removed when discarded.

theSlumbering:PrepareAlarm.NAME: Prepare Alarm
theSlumbering:PrepareAlarm.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Give it theslumbering:Snooze for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:Snooze.NAME: SNOOZE!
theSlumbering:Snooze.DESCRIPTION: theslumbering:Snooze your entire hand. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:CircadianArrhythmia.NAME: Sleep Arrhythmia
theSlumbering:CircadianArrhythmia.DESCRIPTION: Draw all your theslumbering:Snooze cards. NL Exhaust.

theSlumbering:HeavySleeper.NAME: Heavy Sleeper
theSlumbering:HeavySleeper.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you theslumbering:Snooze a card, gain !M! Block.
